title: Nice Temple
review: Amazing temple. Very nice Hanuman murti. Walking in cave is a memorable experience. Must watch temple.

title: Jai Shree ram
review: This Hanuman Mandir is a must go place if you are traveling nearby.

title: Temple
review: The place is nice and very peaceful. Parking can be an issue sometimes as the cars are parked on the road to Naukuchiatal

title: a hanuman temple near bhimtal
review: a big statue of hanumanji and view from the backside of temple is the attraction; no force on paying the puja to the deity is there, but you may offer. in the morning, no rush too.

title: Hanuman Garhi in Naukuchiatal, Bhimtal  "The treasure lies underneath"
review: In one of my regular visits to Nainital I had occasion to talk to a gentleman who walks his 3 dogs from the mandir to the lake every morning and greets everyone with "Radhe Radhe" and gives a sweet as prasad. He turned out to be one G.S.Bisht who is the head of Bhakti Dham Trust which runs the temple complex. He invited me to visit the temple which I happily agreed to.

title: Nice
review: It's a huge statue of Hanumnji which is eye catching! There is also a cave in this temple.

title: Sacred place
review: A very tall statue of hanumana is there. It was quite open space and not really crowded. After the temple visit you can go for lake ride.

title: Bajrangbali the Great
review: Situated in-between Bhimtal Naukuchiatatal a temple with a huge statue of Lord Bajrangbali Ji.a temple very neat and clean with a great ambiance. a must stop spot on the way to Naukuchiatal.

title: Divine.
review: Situated in-between Bhimtal-Naukuchiatal, Hanuman Ji Temple is a must stop spot on the way to Naukuchiatal. The Temple has a 52 feet high statue of  Hanuman Ji. The Temple has an artificial cave; designed on the lines of the famous Vaishno Devi Shrine, which encircles the temple.

title: Break your journey here on the way to Nakuchiatal
review: Beautiful temple on Road side. Peaceful and less-crowded. Spend some time over here for rest. Excellent for those who have travel sickness in hills for journey break.

title: Nice temple!
review: Lovely statue of Hanuman ji. Good visit in the area between naukuchiatal and bhimtal. The local administration did take adhyatmik test which was a good activity.

title: Beautiful Temple
review: The temple is beautiful with a humongous statue of Lord Hanuman, the premise is very clean and view from the temple is memerising.

title: Calm
review: This temple is located on the road from Naukchiatal to Bhimtal. Clean and well maintained. It has a big Lord Hanuman statue.

title: Nice and peaceful temple. Nothing great about it.
review: We visited the lake tour (Bhimtal, Sattal, Naukuchiatal, Hanuman temple) with a drop to Kathgodam to railway station on 21st Mar. We booked a cab for 1700 for this trip. It is cheaper by about 200-300 rs. as tour guides in Nainital were asking about 2000. The drivers no. is 9410515185 (Hafeez Ahmed). very good and cooperative guy.

title: Worship  place.
review: There is a very big statue  of lord Hanuman ,so many  other God and Goddess diety is also  there . One book seller is also sittings  there who sells religious books.it is a temple. Nothing special about it.

title: Jai Hanuman !!
review: We did visited Hanuman Garhi during our recent visit while returning from Lake Tour, Located on the way and attraction silently insists you to take a break and encourages for prayers

title: Must visit in Bhimtal
review: One of the places to visited in Bhimtal for beautiful sceneries from the temple. It has replicated the Vaishnodevi temple like tunnel and also a big Hanuman statue.

title: Awesome
review: The statue of Lord Hanuman is tall and one of its kind. The view is beautiful from the temple of mountains

title: One of the best spiritual places around Nainital
review: When you will be nearby Bhimtal, you will surely want to visit Hanuman Garhi. The Hanuman statue is great attraction especially for kids. Inside you will find calm and quite aradhana hall. You can write your wish on paper and place it there. Prashad is available for free. Very clean and quite place.

title: Quiet small place
review: Loved this quiet corner amongst the greenery. The temple emitted positive energy. Stay some time to feel the vibes

title: Loved This Place
review: Very neat and clean with cave like entrance. You can have free food here from bhandara with self service. Must visit place for everyone.

title: Very attractive but peaceful temple
review: Very attractive idol of Lord Hanuman . It is on the way from Bhimtal to Naukuchiyatal. It is a place of worship which is very popular among locals.I find it very peaceful and full of positive energy.

title: A must visit
review: Very nice temple with excellent view. A must visit if you are around this place. We visited on our way from Bhimtal to Naukuchiyatal

title: Darshan
review: Stopped in for a Darshan. The temple dedicated to Hanuman God is beautifully located in its own. There are no shacks and other vendors so there is a clean environment and located on the top of the ridge it has lively views.

title: Beautiful temple with very big statue of Lord Hanuman. A very peaceful place and devotional atmosphere.
review: A beautiful temple complex with beautiful statue of Hanuman Ji. and cave of Vaishno devi temple. Beautiful sorroundings and devotional atmosphere.

title: Auspicious Place
review: This Hanuman Temple is considered very auspicious among the local people as well as the travellers. A lot of tourists were also seen here.

title: Calm and serene
review: Really loved the temple so calm and peaceful.

title: Very Clean place
review: The place has  very big statue of Lord Hanuman and replica of Ma Vaishno Devi Gufa. Besides it was made by Maa Moni Devi who is quite famous locally for her 62 years of silence and building of many temples and social work. The place is located on Naukchiatal lake road from Bhimtal. U can join there free meditation workshops. And knowledge session with spirtiual test too. Also photos are allowed here and even a special place to click selfies with Hanuman statue. There is a wish box if you are interested in sending message to God. Overall very clean except parking issue and little maintainance on toilets...But must visit if you like meditation and want to enjoy picturesque location.

title: Lovely temple
review: The temple is on a great height.

title: Family trip
review: It is beautiful temple located near bhimtal lake. It has huge idol of Hanuman Ji. Seems to be newly built and not sure if there is some history behind it's origin. Adjacent to it is Devi Mata's temple whcih also looks newly built.

title: Sandeep from Indian Exotic Routes Excellent Ayodhya Guide
review: Please use Sandeep from Indian Exotic Routes as your tour guide of Hanuman Garhi and Ayodhya. You will relive the historical significance of the place made possible by his extensiveknowledge and enthusiasm.

title: Excellent place to explore
review: A good place to enjoy the nature and cripping of birds around. The statue of Hanuman jee atract the most and best is sunset view.

title: refreshing hanuman temple
review: nice huge idol, some tiny caves etc give the temple a different look and feel. a refreshing visiting spot from the monotonous scenery

title: Hanuman Temple near Bhimtal
review: It is the famous Hanuman temple on the way to Nauchikyatal from Saatal and hosts a huge statue of lord Hanuman with a beautiful view behind.

title: Hanuman temple on top of hill
review: The temple is located on highest point in Nainital and views from temple are breathtaking.  Sun set view is very good. Temple is very good and nice with marble statues. Remote location from Nainital and own vehicle is needed to reach this place

title: Well maintained Temple with good view
review: A must visit if you are around this place. Very peaceful & worth spending some time. Good place for families.

title: A Must Visit
review: If you are at Bhimtal, this Temple is like must visit. You will definitely love this Hanuman Temple.

title: Jai bajrang Bali..
review: It is not far from bhimtal... And on the way to naukuchia tal.  It has a very tall statue of hanuman ji as well as a cave for mataji. Kids will love the cave and the small bridge over the small pond in front of hanuman ji. It is also in the tourist circuit of the local taxi operators. Do go there.

title: Hanuman Temple
review: This place is an ashram where Shree Bhakti Ma (Mauni Mai) has spent 62 years of her life without speaking a single word (Moun). Must visit

title: Jai Shri Hanuman
review: Location of the temple is the USP. There is a huge statue of God Hanuman which is very picturesque. A small replica of Cave is also there. A quick visit is definitely recommended.

title: Bajrang Bali
review: Temple is near to bhimtal. Tall statue of hanumanji and cave there. It is on the hill top and you have a nice view from there.

title: Must visit
review: its on the way to nauchiktal. beautiful temple. Gufa is the main attraction. Take some time out and take a look at the fields, its breath taking,

title: Beautiful , if only it was not so loud
review: The hanuman moorti is very impressive. Though it gets extremely loud here as the mandir management likes to play bhakti songs on loud speakers all day long and even till late in evening.

title: Serene temple in secluded spot
review: Must visit temple quite close to Nainital. Secluded, Serene and with nice view around. Made by Neeb Khatoli baba so a must visit for people visiting Kainchi dham.

title: Hanuman Garhi
review: One of the temple located on top of hill wherein you can view  whole nainital and love the fresh air with immense purity of Hanuman mandir...

title: Serene
review: This temple comes on the way to naukuchiatal, and its very beautiful. There is a large statue of Hanuman, and the whole surroundings is very beautiful.

title: OK place
review: You will find a tall hanuman statue which looks magestic and good. and beside that is a small cave which leads to Vaishno devi look alike worshipping place. The place looked almost deserted and nobody was there when we visited.

title: Good effort to looks like Natural place
review: The temple is in midway while heading towards Bhimtal.

title: Its a Wow, Must Visit
review: Showering Blessings is the Hanuman Garhi, Must visit place if you are in Nanital, Bhimtal or close to this destination

title: Nice
review: It's a small temple which has a cave depicting a Vaishno Devi Cave. It won't take more than 10 min to cover the temple.

title: A Must visit for its vastness... Divine temples...and Scenic location
review: There are two main temples of Hanumanji in Nainital. One one the way to  Naukuchiya Tal and another at around 3.5 km from Nainital on the way from Delhi to Nainital. This temple is on the road between Bhim Tal and Navkuchiya Tal. Situated on the road and eye catching due to the very big around 40 ft high Hanumanji idol. The place is scenic with a beautiful view of hills. The temples are situated in two floors. Few temples are directly on the road floor and few are one floor below. A artificial cave is created to get down to the Paduka of Hanumanji; also a Vaishno Devi temple below. Do not forget to visit Radha Krishna temple for which you have to climb up 10-15 steps. This temple is serene and with a big podium. Seat there, close your eyes and meditate for few minutes.  Overall its a must visit temple when you visit Nainital.

title: Peaceful
review: For me a a temple should be peaceful and allow one to settle down. This place has the space and views to offer peace. There are couple of shrines inside the complex. It offers good space to sit, meditate and not be disturbed. It is exactly opposite of crowded famous temples in India. It has got a great location and you can enjoy the views. There are couple of restaurants near by if you want to eat something.

title: Temple
review: Just a small temple.nothing attraction except that the way to main temple is through a small cave.30 sec cave must say.

title: A beautiful place to hang around
review: A beautiful place to hang around with your family and friends. Specially winter afternoon time is very comforting and romantic. Go and enjoy your journey.

title: Spiritual
review: A beautiful temple with a huge idol of Lord Hanuman. It lies on the way to Naukuchiatal from Bhimtal. Went to this temple early in the morning and found the place very peaceful and spiritual. The temple also has small Maa Vaishno Devi gufa. The best part is that there are no beggars over here as one finds in many temples in India.

title: correction there
review: It's in nainital not bhimtal approx 23 km from bhimtal actually and 3 km from nainital to khurpatal side

title: Awesome place
review: This is a must visit if you are going to Bhimtal. I found this place to be one of those temples where your mind is actually relaxed. There is peace in the air and you feel good.

title: Grand view of Hanumanji
review: Good temple, good view. Liked the 'gufa' created and the placement of vaishno mata idols too. The hanumanji idol is huge and the temple made in open offers a great view. Not too far from the bhimtal lake. Its on the way to Naukuchiatal and definetly a must see if you happen t o go to the naukuchital lake since not much to see anyways around bhimtal.

title: spiritual and peaceful place
review: the place is spiritual and peaceful with a huge idol of lord hanuman. we have go through a small cave to enter the cave. This place has the space and views to offer peace. the temple offer good place to sit and meditate.

title: Another temple
review: Just another temple with a large statue of Hanuman ji. Nothing much otherwise. There are better temples in and around the area.

title: Neat and clean temple
review: A small neat and clean temple. The statue of lord hanuman is huge. Peaceful place to sit abd relax for a while.

title: The palce is not very crowded and is clean. The view from Garhi is amazing.
review: The view from Garhi is amazing. Loved the approach of the local people. Very honest and welcoming to the visitors.

title: Tranquil and Bliss
review: The wonderful flowers, cleanliness and tranquil setting with a good view of Sun Set! It is so unfortunate that photography is strictly forbidden. There is another temple behind for those who love a bit of trek and nature walk.

title: Nice photogenic place for short visit
review: While on the way to Naukuchiatal, you have a huge nice idiol of lord Hanumanji. The temple is neat and clean and very calm though on the road itself. The huge idiol is very attractive. The place certainly is liked by most of the visitors.

title: Good Hanuman temple
review: If you stay in Naukuchiyatal, this is a good place to visit. We walked from our hotel. The temple has a giant statue of Hanuman. I felt very peaceful when I visited this temple.

title: Divine
review: The Temple along with the long standing statute of Hanuman ji is must visit place to pay homage to God

title: Nice temple compkex
review: This is a nice place to visit in Bhimtal area. Although we did not try the artificial cave of Vaishno Devi, we liked the small temple complex & good views around. We also got ourselves evsluated on our knowledge of spiritualism at a vounter here. Worth a visit.

title: Amazing Place
review: Best in Bhimtal. Huge statue of Lord Hanuman. View of valley is awesome. Must visit palace in bhimtal trip

title: Divine Place!!
review: This place is on the way to naukuchiatal from Bhimtal. Its not very far from the talital. The place have a Gigantic idol of hanuman ji and also temple .

title: Powerful Temple
review: Drive to Hanuman Garhi is itself enjoyable & temple is very nice. One will experience when you visit personally and view from this temple is very beautiful of Nainital natures.

title: Hanuman temple
review: This is near to Bhimtal lake.A big size Hanuman statue is here & it is a very peaceful , clean temple.Now a days you can find many temples with more gigantic statues of god hanuman. The best part of this temple is the atmosphere with cool breeze & view of hills . Since it is near by an other main lake, you will not loose much time.

title: hanuman garhi
review: Hanuman garhi is a temple .where is a huge statute of hanuman .it comes when you go nauchitaal from bheemtaal

title: Bhimtal visit
review: Nice visit. Hunuman Garhi is a very nice place to visit for  devotees & tourist. We have seen a very high stachue of Lord Hanumanji, with  the other Goddess  , Ramdarwar, Lord Shiva etc. It is very near from Bhimtal lacke, I advised to every one who is going to visit Bhimtal must see the Hanuman Garhi temple.

title: Jai Bajrangbali!!
review: Best part is one can pray in  peace on hilltop unlike temples in metro city. Big Hanumanji  Valley view temple is also beautiful.  While coming back stopped at a sunset point. The view was incredible. Must visit during afternoon to watch the sunset also

title: good place to visit
review: Good holy place, very huge idol of Hanuman, surrounding scenery is mind blowing. Great view of Bhimtal can be seen from this place. Children and senior citizens will like this place much. You can click pictures as surrounding of this place is very beautiful. Shops of daily goods are available nearby so you can purchase as per your needs.

title: Really huge
review: This was a really huge statue, beautifully structured. Towering and colossal. Powerful for all the strong devotees.

title: Decent place
review: On the way to visit the spots. Not a must have, unless you are spiritual enough to pay a visit to this place.

title: osum temple
review: The presiding deity of Hanuman Garhi is Hanuman, a devotee of Lord Rama, who is depicted in the image as opening his chest and revealing the images of Lord Ram and Sita Mata in his heart. Other than having religious significance.

title: Big, huge statue of Hanuman!!!!
review: Good holy place, very huge idol of Hanuman,is about 40 feet tall. Surrounding scenery is mind blowing. Great view of Bhimtal can be seen from this place. Children and senior citizens will like this place much. You can click pictures as surrounding of this place is very beautiful. Shri Hanuman temple with its own charm and presence. I have found it very relaxing.

title: Very beautiful temple
review: It is very nice temple. It has very interesting cave called as Vaishno devi cave. Very large and beautiful statue of Hanuman. Make sure you go there early morning to avoid evening crowd.

title: Good views and memories.
review: NICE EVENING AT SERENE ATMOSPHERE. We had good time as it was on the way from nakuchia tal to Bhimtal were we were staying.

title: Enchanting Experience
review: beautiful temple with caves and small waterfall...love the surroundings and view from the temple..had a great time!

title: The Hanuman Temple... A must visit.
review: A quite old temple on the way to Naukuchital after almost 3 KMs from Bhimtal. Great views and one can click the pics. Peaceful surroundings. Never eat anything in the restaurant in front of the temple. Better to reach at Naukuchiatal and eat something there.

title: Temple
review: It doesn't have much difference than the regular temple,no doubt it was beautiful but you can skip this place if you are running short on time..

title: very big sized statue of hanuman ji
review: very big sized statue of hanuman ji is there  in the temple. prashad offering is prohibited. instead prashad is given by the temple.apart from the big statue, the temple is small.

title: Jai Hanuman
review: Smal but a very neat & clean temple on the top of a mountain just 5mins drive from Bhimtaal.. A must see location.

title: Wonderful Hanuman ji's temple
review: Very neat and clean temple- board on temple wall says "please remove your shoes and ego here" :). The sanstha that manages temple was taking spiritual quiz when we went there. I had scored 80/100 :)

title: Jai Jai Jai Bajrang Bali
review: Hanuman Garhi beautifully, built on a hill at height of 6,401 ft, located very near to Bhimtal lake. Temple with gigantic statue of Hanuman Ji, also offers spectacular views of the magnificent sun set & valley view of the Tarai from here.

title: Nice place to visit
review: Must go... Place is good..

title: Beautiful temple
review: couldn't believe such a big idol of Hanuman would be there in the hills. nicely built and maintained. A beautiful temple and good scenic beauty of the valley from there.

title: Beautiful temple
review: on the way to Bhimtal, you can see a beautiful Hanuman temple, very well maintained . A must visit if in bhimtal.

title: Blessing of Lord Hanuman !
review: You can go down to the temple for the Blessing of Lord Hanuman !.

title: Hanuman Garhi....divinity at hills
review: Hanuman Garhi or Hanumangarhi is located some 3.5 km from the Tallital or South End bus stop, at an altitude of 6,401 ft. Lord Hanuman – the monkey god of the epic Ramayana is the main deity of the temple. The place also offers some good views of the setting sun over the Himalayas. The statue of Hanuman located here is about 4 m high.

title: Nice Surprise
review: A temple visit in a hill station has a certain old world expectation laded with it. But the Hanuman Garhi is anything but that. The temple is a very clean, newly made and well maintained complex, with a larger than life size statue of Hanuman with a fountain if you walk past it,and a photo op if you see it from the road. Some areas looked in progress (e.g. Devi Gufa Marg) and hope to see it completed whenever I visit next.

title: pilgrimage
review: Reportedly built by  the legendary Neem Karoli Baba,the sanctum sanctorum, is the imposing Hanuman Temple.Very well connected to NainiTal-Bhowali Road.Temple services are good.

title: Devotees please visit
review: Hanuman Garhi is a good visit for devotees.  Very peaceful temple.  Looks kind of small from outside but has an entire ashram running inside.  Large statue of Hanuman and a Ram temple add a holy touch to the Bhimtal visit.  They serve prasad as lunch.  Try it if you like simple temple food.

title: spiritual centre
review: do visit hanuman garhi on your visit ,they have good accomdations at budget rates-plus the "spiritual questionarie" they distribute are a very good experience.

title: Excellent experience
review: Hanuman garhi temple is the best temple in Bhimtal. Very good design, excellent surrounding,Nice whether. Love to visit again hanuman ji temple.

title: Very nice temple
review: Must visit if you are visiting Bhimtal. A very peaceful place near bhimtal lake. Also has maa vaishno devi temple

title: Must visit
review: Located very near to Bhimtal lake, it is very neat and clean temple and you can see huge statue of Lord Hanuman.

title: Very nice Temple
review: Very nicely built and maintained. Priests very helpful and guided us to visit and see the whole place..

title: Highlight is the God Hanuman statue
review: Hanuman Garhi  is located some 3.5 km from the Tallital or South End bus stop of Nainital, at an altitude of 1950m. . It was developed by Neem Karoli Baba in 1950. The temple is itself situated at a beautiful spot surrounded by hills and forests. Lord Hanuman – the monkey god of the epic Ramayana is the main deity of the temple. The place also offers some good views of the setting sun over the Himalayas. The statue of Hanuman located here is about 4 m high.

title: Religious place
review: Hanumangarhi, also known as Hanuman Garh, is located at an altitude 1,951 m (6,401 ft). The temple complex is about 3.5 km (2.2 mi) from the Tallital (South End) bus stop. The presiding deity of the temple is Lord Hanuman, the vanara god of the Ramayana, and he is depicted tearing open his chest to reveal Rama and Sita in his heart. It is connected saint Neem Karoli Baba, who had his ashram at Kainchi. Hanuman Garhi is also known for its spectacular views of the setting sun.

title: The huge Hanuman statue..
review: Saw the Hanuman Garhi on the way to Naukuchiatal. . The main attraction is the huge Hanuman statue. . The temple is clean and well maintained.

title: Must Visit
review: On the way to Naukuchiatal from Bhimtal, you see this Hanuman Temple with huge Hanumanji Idol. Worth Visiting

title: U just cant miss this temple on the way to Naukuchiatal
review: Hanuman Garhi (temple) in Bhimtal is an excellent place on the way to Naukuchiatal.

title: Must Visit when in Bhimtal
review: its a small but beautiful temple , very clean and calm place..so when in bhimtal its worth visiting once..

title: Beautiful Temple...
review: This is a very beautiful and quite temple in the middle of Bhimtal and Naukuchiyatal. Main attraction of is the gigantic statue of Lord Hanuman...

title: Nice Temple
review: Amazing temple. Very nice Hanuman murti. Walking in cave is a memorable experience. Must watch temple.

title: Temple
review: The place is nice and very peaceful. Parking can be an issue sometimes as the cars are parked on the road to Naukuchiatal

title: Jai Shree ram
review: This Hanuman Mandir is a must go place if you are traveling nearby.

title: a hanuman temple near bhimtal
review: a big statue of hanumanji and view from the backside of temple is the attraction; no force on paying the puja to the deity is there, but you may offer. in the morning, no rush too.

title: Hanuman Garhi in Naukuchiatal, Bhimtal  "The treasure lies underneath"
review: In one of my regular visits to Nainital I had occasion to talk to a gentleman who walks his 3 dogs from the mandir to the lake every morning and greets everyone with "Radhe Radhe" and gives a sweet as prasad. He turned out to be one G.S.Bisht who is the head of Bhakti Dham Trust which runs the temple complex. He invited me to visit the temple which I happily agreed to.

title: Nice
review: It's a huge statue of Hanumnji which is eye catching! There is also a cave in this temple.

title: Sacred place
review: A very tall statue of hanumana is there. It was quite open space and not really crowded. After the temple visit you can go for lake ride.

title: Bajrangbali the Great
review: Situated in-between Bhimtal Naukuchiatatal a temple with a huge statue of Lord Bajrangbali Ji.a temple very neat and clean with a great ambiance. a must stop spot on the way to Naukuchiatal.

title: Divine.
review: Situated in-between Bhimtal-Naukuchiatal, Hanuman Ji Temple is a must stop spot on the way to Naukuchiatal. The Temple has a 52 feet high statue of  Hanuman Ji. The Temple has an artificial cave; designed on the lines of the famous Vaishno Devi Shrine, which encircles the temple.

title: Nice temple!
review: Lovely statue of Hanuman ji. Good visit in the area between naukuchiatal and bhimtal. The local administration did take adhyatmik test which was a good activity.
